channel.title: Can i defeat the lvl 83 dragon in dragon slayer?
channel.description:
hey I've been wondering if i can defeat the lv 83 dragon in dragon slayer quest- heres al my lvls and planned to use items (im lvl 52)
attack level: 44 defence level:43 strength level:43 hp level:43 magic level:24
i plan to get to use water bolt, rune longsword, anti dragon shield, addmant full (no helm), 24 lobsters (maybe less after i have to kill al the skeletons and stuff), and im bringing a ring of deuling (7) if i have to tele outa there, and if not the ring of deuling ill have a recoil ring (20 more hits) so, my question is, can i defeat the lvl 83 dragon? :confused:

item.title: Can i defeat the lvl 83 dragon in dragon slayer?
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Kind of nooby account but ive seen worse and they have killed Elvarg(level-83)
So i say yes you could kill him , but it might be helpfull if you train mage to 45+ to hit harder and have better spells

Read full topic

item.title: Can i defeat the lvl 83 dragon in dragon slayer?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Doc. Booty, post:10, topic:108922”]ROFL!

Man Dragons are easy!!

My Level 40 Freind went in wild with a mith dagger and was owning Green Drags with me.

Elgar is prolly the easiest dragon you will find…[/quote]

Not If You Forget The Shield Lol… He 1 Hits You XD

Read full topic
